column1: '''Éogan''' is a character created specifically for ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]''. He was one of the Men of Angmar, the [[Angmarim]], but became the second-in-command of the [[Blackwolds]], and eventually their chieftain.
He led an attack [[Archet]] attempting to find the treasure they were looking for from two [[Hobbits]]. He managed to slay the town's captain, [[Jon Brackenbrook
column2: Jon Brackenbrook's]] father, but was wounded himself in the attack. He fled after he learned the two Hobbits staying in Archet weren't the ones he was looking for.<ref>{{VGC
